message: I'm being generous here, Bob.  Take it or leave it!
Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's split it down the middle this time. I'm starting to think this inflation is getting out of hand!
Inflation is hurting you more, I'll take a bit more this time.
Okay, Bob, I'm getting tired of this. Let's split it 60-40, your way, and call it a day.
